title: Bergen International Film Festival
content: Films from all over the world gather all film enthusiasts for unique moments at the Bergen International Film Festival.

title: Wool week
content: ULLVEKA 2021 will be held for the eighth time in the period 22 - 31 October 2021, and will take place in the entire Bergen region.

title: Light park at Bergenhus Fortress
content: LUMAGICA - a magical experience for young and old at Bergenhus Fortress, 12 November to 19 December 2021.

title: Gingerbread City 2021
content: The world's largest Gingerbread Town can be found in the Xhibition shopping center, right in the center of Bergen
